name: Catch my Drift
description:
Turn pirates into mail carriers! In this visual novel style game, you must convince a pirate captain to help you transport messages and resources between your home island and the main land, after the angry Ocean Goddess has banned humans from the seas.

Credits: 

Story: Sam “Inverts” Boyd and Trevor Bream

Programming: Trevor Bream

Character Art and Backgrounds: Sam “Inverts” Boyd

Story Illustration and Moral Support: Yokaiy
